fullText: James Ijames's Pulitzer Prize-winning play is a raucous, irreverent riff on Hamlet that transplants Shakespeare's tragedy to a contemporary Black family barbecue in North Carolina.
dtliExcerpt: James Ijames's Pulitzer Prize-winning play is a raucous, irreverent riff on Hamlet that transplants Shakespeare's tragedy to a contemporary Black family barbecue in North Carolina.
